actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the United Nations disaster relief system.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the United Nations should: (1) reform and streamline the United Nations disaster relief system; (2) establish one entity that integrates the United Nations agencies currently rendering disaster relief and that stockpiles and manages an international inventory of basic materials necessary to provide adequate relief; and (3) apportion its inventory of disaster relief materials around the world according to need. Declares that the President should take actions to advance the implementation of such policy.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the United Nations disaster relief system.
